overview: All in one evergreen collection: 10 animated specials you've grown up with and loved -- including 3 new to DVD!  Disc 1 Dr. Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas! From animation legend Chuck Jones comes one of the best holiday cartoons of all time, adapting the Dr. Seuss story and starring Boris Karloff as the voice of you-know-Who. Also includes New to DVD: The Lebrechauns' Christmas Gold Pinocchio's Christmas The Stingiest Man in Town
title: Classic Christmas Favorites Disc 1
